Verses: 1 ezhaam Maadham Mudhalthedhi Parisuththa Sabaikoodum Naalaayirukkakkadavadhu; Adhil Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu; Adhu Ungalukku Ekkaalamoodhum Naalaayirukkavendum.
2 appozhudhu Neengal Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
3 avaigalukku Aduththa Pojanapaliyaaga Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavile Kaalaikkaagap Paththil Moondru Pangaiyum, Aattukkadaavukkaaga Irandu Pangaiyum,
4 ezhu Aattukkuttigalil Ovvondrirkaaga Oru Pangaiyum,
5 ungal Paavanivarththikkaana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththi,

6 maadhappirappin Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum Dhinanthorum Idum Sarvaanga Thagana Paliyaiyum Adhan Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Muraimaikketra Paanapaligalaiyum Andri, Ivaigalaiyum Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Seluththakkadaveergal.
7 indha Ezhaam Maadham Paththaam Thedhi Ungalukkup Parisuththa Sabaikoodum Naalaayirukkakkadavadhu; Adhile Neengal Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyaamal, Ungal Aaththumaakkalaith Thaazhmaippaduththi,
8 karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
9 avaigalin Pojanapaliyaaga Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavile Kaalaikkaagap Paththil Moondru Pangaiyum, Andha Oru Aattukkadaavukkaaga Irandu Pangaiyum,
10 ezhu Aattukkuttigalil Ovvondrirkaagap Paththil Oru Pangaiyum,

11 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththi, Paavanivaaranapaliyaiyum, Niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum Andri, Ivaigalaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.

12 ezhaam Maadham Padhinaindhaam Thedhi Ungalukkup Parisuththa Sabaikoodum Naalaayirukkakkadavadhu; Adhil Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu; Ezhunaal Karththarukkup Pandigai Aasarikkakkadaveergal.
13 neengal Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyulla Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Padhinmoondru Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,

14 avaigalin Pojanapaliyaaga Enneyile Pisaindha Melliya Maavile Andhap Padhinmoondru Kaalaigalil Ovvondrirkaagap Paththil Moondru Pangaiyum, Andha Irandu Aattukkadaakkalil Ovvondrirkaaga Irandu Pangaiyum,
15 padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalin Ovvondrirkaaga Oru Pangaiyum.
16 niththiya Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
17 irandaam Naalile Pannirandu Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
18 kaalaigalum Aattukkadaakkalum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuth Thakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
19 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum Andri, Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
20 moondraam Naalile Padhinoru Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
21 kaalaigalum Aattukkadaakkalum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
22 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
23 naangaam Naalile Paththuk Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
24 kaalaigalum Aattukkadaakkalum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
25 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
26 aindhaam Naalile Onbadhu Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
27 kaalaigalum Aattukkadaakkalum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
28 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
29 aaraam Naalile Ettuk Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
30 kaalaigalum Aattukkadaakkalum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
31 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaligalaiyum Andri, Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
32 ezhaam Naalile Ezhu Kaalaigalaiyum, Irandu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Padhinaangu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
33 kaalaigalum Aattukkadaakkalum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
34 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.
35 ettaam Naal Ungalukku Viseshiththa Aasarippu Naalaayirukkakkadavadhu; Adhil Saadhaaranamaana Yaadhoru Velaiyum Seyyalaagaadhu.
36 appozhudhu Neengal Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyulla Thaganamaana Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Kaalaiyaiyum, Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum, Oru Vayadhaana Pazhudhatra Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum,
37 kaalaiyum Aattukkadaavum Aattukkuttigalum Irukkira Ilakkaththirkuththakkadhaaga Muraimaiyinpadi Avaigalin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Avaigalin Paanapaligalaiyum,
38 niththiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum, Adhin Pojanapaliyaiyum, Adhin Paanapaliyaiyum Andri, Paavanivaarana Paliyaaga Oru Vellaattukkadaavaiyum Seluththakkadaveergal.

39 ungal Poruththanaigalaiyum, Ungal Urchaagapaligalaiyum, Ungal Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum, Ungal Pojanapaligalaiyum, Ungal Paanapaligalaiyum, Ungal Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Andri, Neengal Ungal Pandigaigalile Karththarukku Seluththavendiyavaigal Ivaigale Endru Sol Endraar.
40 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Mose Isravel Puththirarukku Sonnaan.
